faq_how_it_works_message:
*How It Works*

The bot uses AI to open trades on USDT/BTC futures, dividing users' funds for minimized risk. This ensures profits even over short-term periods.
faq_how_to_make_deposit_message:
*How to Deposit*

Go to "My Profile" > "Top Up" - Copy the USDT TRC20 wallet address and make your deposit. Click "Verify Payment" once the transfer is done (10% commission applies).

Minimum deposit: 20 USDT.
faq_how_to_withdraw_funds_message:
*How to Withdraw*

Go to "My Profile" > "Withdraw Funds". Enter the amount and your USDT TRC20 wallet address. Withdrawals take 10 minutes to 2 hours (up to 7 days max). Minimum withdrawal: 20 USDT.
faq_what_is_the_commistion_message:
*Fees*

We charge 10% on deposits and withdrawals, but no fee on individual trades.
faq_minimum_deposit_message:
*Minimum Deposit*

You can start with as little as 20 USDT. For optimal bot performance, we recommend 500 USDT.
faq_bot_trading_exchange_message:
*Trading Platforms*

The bot trades on top exchanges like Binance.
faq_available_transactions_message:
*Supported Trades*

The bot currently trades USDT/BTC futures without leverage.
faq_possible_risks_message:
*Risk Management*

Risk is minimized with multiple transactions, separate wallets, and no leverage.
faq_token_storage_message:
*Token Security*

Tokens are securely distributed across multiple wallets to prevent theft.
faq_loss_of_token_message:
*Loss Protection*

The bot only uses part of your balance per transaction, with a stop-loss limit of 2%.
faq_referral_program_message:
*Referral Program*

Earn 10% on all deposits made by users you refer. Share your referral link in the "My Profile" > "Referral Program" section.
faq_any_restrictions_message:
*Restrictions*

There are no current deposit restrictions. However, if funds exceed the bot's capacity, partner profits may reduce, or we may set a pool limit.
faq_bot_stop_loss_point_message:
*Stop Loss Limit*

The bot places a stop loss at no more than 2%, ensuring minimal risk per trade.
faq_building_a_trust_message:
*Building Trust*

We publish daily results, and you can join open discussions with real users in our chat. Try with a 50 USDT deposit, then withdraw profits within a week to test our system.
